coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.lms

Interface ToolContentService<C,U>


  • public interface ToolContentService<C,U>
    This is the tool content service that can retrieve the content for the tool from the lms.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C getContent(String sessionId, String moduleId, Date fromDate)
      Retrieve the content for this tool for the module id and from date.
      U getUserContent(String sessionId, String username, String moduleId, Date fromDate)
      Retrieve the content for this tool for the user, module id and from date.
      Map updateUserContent(String sessionId, String username, String moduleId, Map content, String originalContent)
      Updates the user content on the LMS.

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        C getContent(String sessionId,
           String moduleId,
           Date fromDate)
        Retrieve the content for this tool for the module id and from date.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - The admin user session id.
        moduleId - The module id.
        fromDate - The from date. Only get content from that date forward. Can be null.
        Returns:
        The content.

      • getUserContent

        U getUserContent(String sessionId,
               String username,
               String moduleId,
               Date fromDate)
        Retrieve the content for this tool for the user, module id and from date.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - The admin user session id.
        username - The user who's content we need to get.
        moduleId - The module id.
        fromDate - The from date. Only get data from that date forward.
        Returns:
        The content.

      • updateUserContent

        Map updateUserContent(String sessionId,
                    String username,
                    String moduleId,
                    Map content,
                    String originalContent)
        Updates the user content on the LMS.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - The admin user session id.
        username - The user who's content we need to update.
        moduleId - The module id.
        content - The content to update.
        originalContent - a String object.
        Returns:
        a Map object.
